TopicTitle: Looking for a resources tally mod

Articles.Content:
I wonder if there is a mod available which would give a readout in the VAB/SPH of totals of fuel, electricity, etc. I know I can easily just go to launch, but in the interest of saving time (and laziness), is something like this beast available? Kerbal Engineer Redux has been updated to .22 as far as DV is concerned, but a list of everything on the ship would be amazing.

GSL

Edited October 19, 2013 by gslarmour
As far as i know, MechJeb can possibly list everything you want via the "Custom Windows" screen, total delta-v, or delta-v per stage etc.
that's just Delta-V and such, Gslarmor's after something that adds say, total power. I know there was a mod but I can't remember the name. I'll look through my files and see if I can find it.
